name: Boss Guitar Effects
description:
Some of the famous Boss guitar stompboxes. Feel free to play around with it.


I will be updating this file by adding new stompboxes, effects and new components (and also improving existing components).


ðŸŽ¸ Let me know if you see anything that could be done better! (m.skuza@kosma.pro)


1.2

Two new effects added: Pocket GT and EQ-200 (Equalizer). Both are completely redesigned. I didn't like the original ones at all ;)


1.1

I added new textures for the pedal, black sticker under the knobs and the knobs.


--

An effects unit or effects pedal is an electronic device that alters the sound of a musical instrument or other audio source.


Common effects include distortion/overdrive, often used with electric guitar in electric blues and rock music; dynamic effects such as volume pedals and compressors, which affect loudness; filters such as wah-wah pedals and graphic equalizers, which modify frequency ranges; modulation effects, such as chorus, flangers and phasers; pitch effects such as pitch shifters; and time effects, such as reverb and delay, which create echoing sounds and emulate the sound of different spaces. (Wikipedia)
